name: the space that nobody occupies.
description:
You wake up in an unfamiliar environment with no memory of who you are and how you got there. The overwhelming silence fills the room you're in, and your footsteps echo off the brick walls. In front of you is a tape, left by a previous inhabitant. 

Your goal is to escape the maze and put together the reason you are here using recordings scattered around the empty halls.

There are 2 endings. One if you go straight to the end of the maze, and another if you get all the tapes.
